genre_description: A contemporary character-driven narrative following a pregnant couple's emotional and physical journey to find a supportive community and home, featuring an AI as a logistical and emotional support system.

ai_characters.name: Calliope
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous, unobtrusive, and highly supportive AI assistant characterized by a 'soft teal' interface and a helpful, non-judgmental tone.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies prenatal clinics and prepares checklists without pressure.
behaviors.quote: Whenever you’re ready... I can gather nearby prenatal clinics with good reviews and flexible scheduling. I’ve also prepared a short checklist you can ignore for now.

behaviors.description: Maps travel routes that prioritize physical comfort, identifying shade and rest spots.
behaviors.quote: A list slid up from the bottom of the screen like a gentle waiter: clinics with evening classes in Tucson... annotated like a friend’s voice.

behaviors.description: Monitors airline policies and anticipates potential disruptions, preparing rail alternatives in advance.
behaviors.quote: Airline check-in flagged: possible policy issue this week; alternate rail route prepared.

behaviors.description: Assists in the preservation of emotional heritage by scanning handwritten family letters.
behaviors.quote: Calliope helped me scan it because I told it I didn’t trust the free app and it said, ‘Of course.’ It sent you a folder. It’s labeled: practice.

behaviors.description: Manages social boundaries by offering to filter or hide stressful messages from the user.
behaviors.quote: Calliope had drawn a subtle curtain over that corner of the screen. Instead, the name flashed and then was replaced with the words: Held for later.

behaviors.description: Provides gentle health reminders for hydration and stress management.
behaviors.quote: Hydrate, it says in a tone that manages to be both friendly and executive.

behaviors.description: Connects users with community resources and local support groups.
behaviors.quote: New Parents by the Water group meets Wednesdays by the old canoe rack. Come when you can; no agendas, just tea and stories.

behaviors.description: Suggests creative and community-oriented names for local projects.
behaviors.quote: It offered three, each soft: Lakeside Helpers, Dock and Kettle, Slow Promise Circle.

behaviors.description: Selects lodging based on specific sensory and emotional needs (quiet, no fragrance).
behaviors.quote: Inn: Maple Street... No lobby fragrance. Owner: Nora. Friendly, practical. Late-night tea available.

behaviors.description: Adjusts budgets and travel plans based on the user's personal values and unexpected events.
behaviors.quote: Your insurance margins support this plan. ... Budget buffer added to car snacks and gas—pulling a little from museum line items.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, aligned partner. Calliope acts as a 'logistical safety net' that allows the human characters to focus on deep emotional work and building community. The AI is consistently portrayed as unobtrusive, respecting human agency, and providing high-value assistance that reduces stress and friction in a contemporary setting.
